website_summaries.verdict: A kitchen multi-tasker with a high-end, modern design.
pros: A large interior with plenty of room to adjust the included rack
Features a backlit LCD display and multiple temperature and cook settings
Rotisserie setting is foolproof and alerts cooks when food is done with an audible alarm
cons: Exterior of the oven heats up considerably

customer_reviews.title: This is so much more than a toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this oven to put in my RV. It’s amazing and so much more than I expected! I didn’t realize, when I ordered, how multifunctional it would be. It has a toast function, of course, it also has bake, broil, Pizza, cookies, defrost (what?!), reheat, keep warm, a rotisserie function (can’t wait to try that one) AND its a convection oven! This is perfect for everybody, and especially for those that live in small spaces such as RVs, tiny houses, dorm rooms, barracks rooms, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nomadic Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size Unit
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews about "correct Temperature", I decided to place a Rubbermaid thermometer inside on the center rack, on convection mode. Set unit to 180° never got over 170°. Then set unit to 350° unit got up to 400°. Left thermometer inside for between 5 and 10 minutes for the test as the unit was counting down. This just demonstrates that the temperature needs to be monitored when the temp is important. I still like the unit and will continue to use it. I wanted to update my first review but could not find a way to do it.
customer_reviews.author: T Turner

customer_reviews.title: The best purchase of a small appliance I have made!
customer_reviews.text: This little convection oven is awesome! Does not need a lot of space and it is just perfect for the simple cooking that I do. It is great, because I no longer have to use the big oven, which makes the house really hot. I strongly recommend this oven! You cannot go wrong! :)
customer_reviews.author: Francine Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic toaster oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic toaster oven. It really is everything in one! The trays that come with it are amazing. There’s even a catch at the bottom to keep it clean! Beautiful stainless. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toaster oven!
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven! It had a digital screen, which I love, with quite a few different options for how to cook your food. It's very versatile. I rarely leave kitchen products in my counter because they look tacky, but this one looks so nice that I leave it out all the time. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven. I now can make a rotisserie chicken for me and my dogs without buying from the store and worrying about what’s in it. Does. It take up much space and has options that my son would use a lot of. Like pizza.
customer_reviews.author: gladue1210

customer_reviews.title: Food comes out perfect
customer_reviews.text: This countertop oven is great as a replacement for a toaster and for making smaller portions. The food comes out perfet because of all of the settings whereas my previous countertop oven used to burn everything and cook unevenly. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. H.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature setting issue
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style and size of this oven. The major issue I had was the temperature settings only go up in 20 degree increments (320, 340, 360...). This isn't a huge problem but it seemed to cook unevenly when I needed something at 375 and used 380. If I went to 360, the time had to be increased quite a bit and I had to monitor closely to determine when it was cooked through. If that quirky issue was fixed, I would rate it 5/5..
customer_reviews.author: B. White

customer_reviews.title: A chicken!
customer_reviews.text: You can cook a chicken in this! Super versatile. Update: I’ve had this for a few months now. I had to call and have a replacement sent because my first one had zero consistency to it, temperature wise when toasting. Since getting the replacement, I’ve had no issues. This toaster oven is fantastic. From waffles, to chicken tenders, to garlic toast, to warming burgers up, it does so much. It does take up a good bit of counter space but they all do. The top and sides of it get crazy hot, which makes me nervous with the kids, but other than that, we love this toaster oven and plan to buy another of its kind in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Our microwave substitute
customer_reviews.text: We finally had reason to ditch our microwave when the glass fell off the front. This toaster oven is a great replacement. There are some things that don't reheat well in the toaster oven, like rice, but for the most part we have had great results reheating leftovers, toasting bread, thawing pancakes, and roasting veggies. It does take longer than a microwave, but I'm happy to no longer have the extra radiation in our kitchen while I'm prepping food.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Gilcher

customer_reviews.title: Wins, on Price - Wins, on Quality - Wins, on Features
customer_reviews.text: It has 1500 watts heating capacity big plus. So far I have cooked a frozen Apple pie and a frozen pizza. Basically, you have top heat source (2) and bottom heat source (2) and both top and bottom (4). then you have time and temp controls. These controls come to you in presets one is "toast" (both) and "how dark" is temp and time is 1,2,3,4,5,6 slices. There are many of these presets. It is a great value and am quite pleased. Every thing worked. There was a small instruction manual, I have ordered a "air fryer" basket and some oven liners from another amazon source. Just check measurements. Roasted caramelized veggies are great.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Really great Oven
customer_reviews.text: I love this little oven. The features are great- especially the convection. I work crazy hours and haven't always taken time to make a "real" meal. Now I don't have to eat microwave food- this speeds things up and cooks really well. I did cookies in it and they came out great! No heating up the whole house to use the "big" oven anymore. Highly recommend. I followed the washing instructions right out of the box, NO chemical smell at all though some had mentioned it. If you follow their instructions , no problem at all! If you're looking for a nice convection countertop oven, buy this- don't spend a couple hundred when you don't need to!
customer_reviews.author: Robbielou

customer_reviews.title: Temperature control in 20 degree increments.
customer_reviews.text: This will only allow for the temperature to be set in 20 degree increments. For instance, if you need to bake something at 400, you can't. You must choose either 390 or 410 degrees. So choose from too hot, or not hot enough. Sounds like a mistake, huh? It isn't, part of the design after talking to customer support. Sounds like a poorly thought out SHORTCUT to me. Otherwise was as described, but returned and didn't use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I ever got along without it
customer_reviews.text: Heats up super fast, very convenient, good size for cooking a couple of chicken breasts. It has many different settings and I've used all of them including the rotisserie. However, there are a few things that took some getting used to. The top gets very hot, so don't store anything there that you're going to forget to move. The increments for temperature are not standard for some settings. watch the broil setting, it gets extremely hot and can burn something in a nanosecond. There is no preheat alarm. The wire rack slides all the way out and can dump whatever is cooking if you're not careful. So, I've adjusted to all the cons, and yes, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Countertop Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: The oven is okay. My toast came out okay. If you only want to make toast just buy a toaster. It has a lot more options. It came with rotisserie fork, will try to make a chicken. It heats up to about 450 and has heat on top and bottom. Convection heating ... Can broil too. It's nice for for what it is, I just think I will be using my microwave and home stove more often. Check the prices.
customer_reviews.author: justmuse

customer_reviews.title: Forget an air fryer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster oven! I was contemplating an air fryer, and I’ve seen much more expensive toaster ovens that double as an air fryer. After learning that the convection function works the same as an air fryer I decided to purchase this. I love how the food comes out with the convection cooking. The only complaint I have is that the temperature only goes up or down by increments of 20 degrees. I don’t know if this is standard but other than that it is perfect. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Craveiro

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster oven I have ever had. Works amazing, especially the convection and broiler feature. Made homemade bread, roasted potatoes, toast, all came out great. This is high end, well made. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the convection oven/toaster. Very easy to use. Highly recommend. Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: GSDGal

customer_reviews.title: Overall, works well
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Cooks a touch unevenly. The knobs are a little more difficult to use than other toaster ovens I've owned. And the crumb tray inserts into the actual toaster oven, instead of from underneath. This makes many of the crumbs fall to the back when taking it out to clean. Doesn't seem very like a good design plan to me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I am so mad at myself for not buying a toaster oven earlier ! I finally decided to bite the bullet and get one and I checked reviews and read descriptions of about 5 or 6 different models. I decided on this one and I am so happy with it ! I've cooked a whole chicken, used the toaster, and used the reheat mode often. It is super easy to clean - the tray slides right out. The only problem I've had is that the rack doesn't seem to fit squarely and I've had to be really careful when placing anything heavy on it that it doesn't tilt. I've had no accidents or anything - I'm just really careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ann E.

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster, no extra pans/shelves available
customer_reviews.text: So far, this toaster oven has proved to be excellent, whether roasting/baking/rehearing... It is definitely as good as brands that are 3 times the price. One star off because, although it comes with 3 different levels for the pan/shelf, it is impossible to get an extra pan from the manufacturer- they say they have none in stock for this. You would have to buy a whole new toaster. They did, however, give me a voucher to buy an extra shelf/pan from Amazon to fit in it, although I had to research which one to get, and that was no small task!
customer_reviews.author: Dafna Trites

customer_reviews.title: Replaces an old 4 slice toaster
customer_reviews.text: We use it for everything, bake, toast, reheat, pizza, only trouble was rotisserie, not with the toaster but with my ability to get the damn bird attached to the rod, lol. We really like this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Butch H

customer_reviews.title: Can't Clean
customer_reviews.text: I have had the oven for about a year and I have used it a lot, at least three times a week. The issues I have with it is that it's impossible to clean. I have all trays wrapped in aluminum foil to catch grease but some of it gets to the bottom cooking elements and it's impossible to clean around them They don't come out. the sides are also a problem because they have baked on crude that won't come off. I have even had it catch fire once from grease. That's a little more broiling than I want.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Engelson

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed... This is a really good toaster oven...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent digital controls with many cooking options, easy to set. Cooks evenly. Convection fan is very quiet. Interior capacity is surprising large. It's a reasonable exterior size for a small apartment. This toaster oven replaces a long string of $30-$35 toaster ovens that usually die in about three years. I decided to spend the extra money this time, and I'm glad I did. I've always had toaster ovens as I'm a single guy who cooks for himself, in smaller portions. It's ridiculous to use the big oven.
customer_reviews.author: K.T.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Easy to use and accurate temperature control. We'll made.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Love this little oven!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to get this oven because it was smaller than my previous ovens, but I am glad I got it. One I got the hang of it I love using it. I have tried most of the functions except for the rotisserie, but I plan to try that soon. The only question I have for the seller is how/where can I get an extra rack? I would like to be able to put two things in the oven at the same time. I have recommended the oven to a friend who was looking for a replacement for her oven.
customer_reviews.author: Chef G

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I live in a studio apartment with no oven, so I needed something that got as close to the experience as possible. This hits almost all the boxes except one odd thing: the temps are intervals of 20 around 350 degrees. Meaning that you can't get 400 degrees; you can do 390 or 410 but not 400... What??? Why wouldn't you just have it in intervals of 10? Its not the end of the world, but if you're a hardcore baker (which im not) you could get frustrated with it. But if you're a hardcore baker, you probably also have a real oven
customer_reviews.author: Martin T. Ricci

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: love the rotisserie aspect especially. Bought this when my stove died and while waiting for the replacement to get installed. Took a bit to get used to the settings, and where to place the rack and set the time when toasting. I do pull it out from under the cabinet when using it. Odd size for baking dish, I have found any that fits well except for the one made for this. Easy to clean, make sure you let it cool down! Overall, quite pleased, and does what it says.
customer_reviews.author: Nana Jan

customer_reviews.title: Temperature increments
customer_reviews.text: It only goes up by increments of 20...so 310, 330, 350, 370...etc. So it's annoying trying to find the right temp especially if it calls for the oven to be set at like 325 or 375. Just a poor design really.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Spring

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is great! Definitely love the functions. One thing I don’t like is that the temps are not super adjustable. There’s no 350, which is very common in America, right? So this machine does 340 or 360. It’s weird. Whatever. Still a great machine. The other thing that drives me bonkers about this machine is that it emits a noise that only electronics can. I have to unplug it after use because the noise gets annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and works great. Big enough to hold quite a bit of food but much better than heating up the whole oven. Esthetically pleasing on the counter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Time For Lunch

customer_reviews.title: Great medium sized convection oven
customer_reviews.text: This works very well and fast cooking. It's just the right size for my needs since I live by myself. I would say it's medium sized.
customer_reviews.author: Timeryder

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid-sized Toaster Oven
customer_reviews.text: I like the clean lines & digital display. The footprint is a little big for my kitchen. But I like the roomy inside & it holds it's temperature. Go with suggestion of running a 30 minute baking at 350 cycle - that'll burn off any lingering smells that new machines sometimes have. Wish you could remove crumb tray outside of the machine. Overall it's the best value out there for this product!
customer_reviews.author: oz67401

customer_reviews.title: A tad small
customer_reviews.text: Is a tad small. However because it does come with bonus accessories it makes up for the size some.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Heaton

customer_reviews.title: enjoying new oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a revile 650. It had as many features plus convection that the breville did not have. I have never heard of this brand but I decided to change it. When it arrived the first thing I did was two pieces of toast. They came out perfect on both sides. The 180 dollar breville never toasted the bottom well. So far every thing we have done has been alright. The only thing than needs to be improved is the rack. It is too light and comes out too far with uno stop. I solved this by counter weight on the rear of the rack.
customer_reviews.author: deadicated reader

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my microwave due to radiation concerns and haven’t looked back since this purchase! Easy to use and has many different settings to reheat, toast, bake, broil etc. I recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Norman

customer_reviews.title: Very  good little oven
customer_reviews.text: Best toaster oven we have ever owned. Well built, good digital controls, flexible programming, good capacity. Unknown brand makes you wonder about durability; time will tell...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Best Little Oven
customer_reviews.text: This oven is excellent!! It cooks evenly and efficiently. I particularly like the rotisserie function. I hook up a cornish hen, set the dial to rotisserie and forget it until the timer alerts me. We hardly use our big oven anymore. I like this oven so well, I got one for our RV. Great oven, great price.
customer_reviews.author: ValuesDirect2u

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but not the best out there
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, though you have to get used to changing the setting. The beep to let you know your toast, etc is done will wake the dead so I have gotten used to watching the countdown timer (handy) and stopping it at 1 second or so when my family is still sleeping. Also, it has started to burn the toast a bit on the bottom, so I have raised the rack to the middle position and it works well again. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: CP3

customer_reviews.title: Be careful you will get burned
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but wish cooking rack didn't fall out so easy
customer_reviews.author: Billy Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Good little unit for price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for several things now and it is easy to clean and use but finding it hard to cook some things but I think this will come in time the more cooking.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use and does a great job on all the different settings. Also a nice looking appliance for the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Sury

customer_reviews.title: Small oven but really usefull
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cool little over. Easy to move around and for sure you will make some delicious foods in it. As far as pizza you can’t make any medium size pizzas. So keep that out of the list but over all it’s good. The only down side I see is it gets really hot so even touching somewhere specially while opening it just be careful cuz you can easily get burned
customer_reviews.author: walid sardar

customer_reviews.title: Very nice reliable oven
customer_reviews.text: I received my order and I couple days ago. Oven seems to work well. It looks very nice on my counter .It preheats quickly and that's a bonus for me. Also it has a roomy interior and it seems to be well made. I know it s hard to find a solid product nowdays. I ve already used it for some baking and everything turned out perfect. So far so good. I recommend it to anyone looking for a decent convection oven .
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cooking options
customer_reviews.text: Love it - but it’s soooo loud when you plug it in and you can’t change that. We don’t use it all the time so every time we use it we plug it in and it freaks out the animals. It’s a little over dramatic how loud it is
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Countertop Convection Oven
customer_reviews.text: After searching for sometime finally found a new countertop convection oven without Teflon. Excellent unit no issues with temp and such and easy clean. Everything about this unit is GREAT. No problems with outgassing.
customer_reviews.author: FarmLife

customer_reviews.title: The tempature only sets in incraments of 20 degrees and 350 is not one of them.
customer_reviews.text: I also don't like the timer as you can't extend it and you have to start all over as in turning the oven off and re-setting. I was hesitant to buy one with digital settings. I should've listened to my gut.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. User friendly and thr perfect size. I brought it to my place of employment which is a restaurant and everyone loves it! I recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Tardif

customer_reviews.title: Very decent.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The door can gets hot, but i wrapped tin foil around it and have no problems at all. Most of my kids meals come out of this thing. It has a small counter top footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Tony rezac

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doc ordered
customer_reviews.text: Has replaced old "oven". Unit is much better at keeping temperature and functions as advertised
customer_reviews.author: D. Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used all the features and all the food I cooked has been great. I don’t have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a can do everything oven
customer_reviews.text: I use this oven to bake almost everything and it cooks fast and thorough. I love it. I no longer use a microwave, because I can reheat and warm foods As well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality toaster oven, works well, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster oven. Big enough, but not huge. Easy to use even though it has a lot of options. I can’t say I see much difference when using the convection feature, but either way it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven, cook pretty much anything in it.

customer_reviews.title: I love this toaster oven.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster oven, its hands down the best one I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I spend days looking for a stainless steel oven, when I finally found this one I couldn't believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica McLeod

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an old toaster over with this. Convection is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: dd

customer_reviews.title: Too small for rotisserie
customer_reviews.text: I can live with the temp thing that so many have mentioned, but it's too small for a chicken of any size. Maybe Cornish Hens?
customer_reviews.author: tommyp

customer_reviews.title: Performance is Impeccable!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is the perfect size, modern look and cooks better than our full-size oven!! I don’t know how I lived without this prior.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use..love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying it! Easy to use! I was a bit larger than I expected!! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good, small, does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good as for making toasts, as well for cooking meatballs or some veggies. Small, with timer, working great, what else you can say about oven :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I'm overall happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving 4 stars because it did arrive with a little damage in the back, doesn't affect how it works and I can hide it while not in use. It arrived 1 day early, just ordered it late afternoon yesterday!!! I made a frozen pizza in it for my 4 yr old and it baked quick and evenly, the controls and modern look are wonderful. I cant wait to make a rotisserie chicken in it! Overall I'm happy with it and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: The price was very reasonable for a convection oven. It’s just what I need for my husband and I, and cooks to perfection
customer_reviews.author: Lillian Dupre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We've been using for a month now and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more use of a big over!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use...I love the pre set functions.. Thanks you made this super simple for us :)
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for small powder coating projects.
customer_reviews.text: The controls on this are easy to use. It works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: JimR

customer_reviews.title: 2ND OVEN I PORUCHASED
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PRODUCT, GREAT PRICE AS WELL! THIS IS A SECOND TIME i PURCHASED THIS ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Verkas

customer_reviews.title: I love everything about this Oven!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this little oven now for 5 months. I've owned many toaster ovens and did LOTS of research. I love that the handle does NOT get hot. Toast bread PERFECTLY!! It's a perfect size for 3 adults. We use it almost daily. I've cooked a 13" pizza and turned it around once comes out perfect. Cooks 15 pizza Rolls in 8 min straight from freezer. No need to preheat.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Included instructions use phrases like "set shelf at desired level" which is easy enough to do but there are no recommendations for what level to use for each setting which would have been nice to have as a starting point. Overall very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Madora Bianco

customer_reviews.title: Love it, great quality.  Hard to find a " no teflon" interior.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, great quality, no teflon unhealthy interior. So yea!!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn brost

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: It's only been used a few times, it feels good and the price is not expensive, but it takes time to confirm its quality
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than it has all the features of a big oven pack into this not so small oven plus it toasts and has an rotisserie.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Stern

customer_reviews.title: Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is the best ever! It can do so many things, you dont even need a stove! I wish I had gotten it sooner, that is my only complaint! Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Matilda K Tabor

customer_reviews.title: Does not bake like a regular oven.
customer_reviews.text: The outside does not get hot. Does not warm up the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Loder

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive & many Uses
customer_reviews.text: Heats up really really fast so watch the toast even on light and one slice. Very energy efficient if you watch it and don't burn your toast.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Heats up fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! Heats up so fast!! Looks awesome on my counter!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it for a few days and love it. It is quality made with many more setting features than I thought. Only negative is no broiling pan is included.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the digital display!
customer_reviews.text: Unit was delivered ahead of time. Packed well simple setup. Love the unit and really like the digital control . Telling all my friends about it! Can't wait till pizza night!
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeVore

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Missing some common trmperature settings, but still cooks well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: sage

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: i had to buy a broiler pan. the one that they give you had no grating .
customer_reviews.author: RAYMOND L

customer_reviews.title: Netter than expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected compact yet it can do a 12 inch pizza. Toasts, reheats and does pizza great. Haven't tried other functions yet. In my opinion definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster oven, would pay 200 for it. Thankfully didn't have to.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It has the actual metal elemts, so it gets to the temperature it say (or close to). Very flexible, and the footprint on coublntertop is small for the size. Would definitely recommend, especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L.

customer_reviews.title: Factory damage
customer_reviews.text: Very cool oven, dented but no damage to packaging. Debating whether it’s worth exchange.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: Temperature
customer_reviews.text: I like this oven. You do need to watch the temperature. Cooks a little fast. Just adjust a.d it's great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Anyvee

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toaster oven!! Easy to use, perfect size. I'm very happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: DZW

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for open counter
customer_reviews.text: Outside case is black. It looks terrible on open counter. But when I tried to return it the company refunded my payment immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Works great, not too hot on the outside. Cooks and toasts quick
customer_reviews.author: Hbd

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: exactly what I wanted. Simple and reliable. Only gripe would be they should have put grooves in the knobs so they are not so slippery when u have greasy hands from cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: It works better than my lst one which was a much more expensive Cuisenart
customer_reviews.text: It should have a rack with the broiler pan that was included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little oven!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is amazing!! I looked around a lot and decided on this one because of the great price and features. After using it for two months, it really has satisfied all of the criteria I was looking for. Very happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: MelO

customer_reviews.title: Needs an extra shelf
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had another shelf. I wanted to cook 2 items and could not fit because there was only 1 shelf. Works good though.
customer_reviews.author: Katie L. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Sleek look
customer_reviews.text: It works much better than my old one. Very impressed
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't too sure when I first saw the controls but they turned out to be easy to use and quite versatile
customer_reviews.author: Judith Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: As described. would purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Good unit for my office. Would recommend. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Mcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Great little convention oven
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a 3.5 lb chicken on the rotisserie. Came out great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: This toaster oven is perfect. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sean P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far...but use and time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Very straightforward oven...Toast is fabulous, steak was OK but certainly left cooking odors. Tonight chicken, we'll see. Seems VERY hot when cooking on all surfaces. Now I'm having to guess and there was no cookbook with suggested frameworks supplied with the oven manual...Google here I come!!!! 2/10/'19: Well....with use I had to change my rating (4 to 2) and opinion. This unit throws off so much heat and is so hot to touch on all its surfaces it's a high risk for related heat burn/accidents. Also... no appreciative benefit with convection function, poor broiler crisping...returned for refund. Nothing ventured, nothing gained, right?
customer_reviews.author: Sean Meehan

customer_reviews.title: So Quick!
customer_reviews.text: Slightly hesitant getting a relatively cheaper convection oven compared to other brands but this honestly DOES THE JOB AND SO MUCH MORE! The quality is amazing, the control panel looks super hi-tech and you can't tell that this is a relatively cheaper alternative! I highly suggest buying this brand; no need to get anything more expensive! I don't even use my full oven anymore. This cooks everything so much faster at lower temps and makes foods crispier (if it's that type of food)!
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Very Stylish but had to return
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the oven for me until I got it home. This oven has many flaws. The baking tray does not fit it is too small. The crumb tray removal is crazy, you have to open the door then remove the crumb tray!!! The interior and exterior measurements are totally incorrect. I liked the digital but that was doing some strange things also. Unfortunately, I returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Prissy

customer_reviews.title: BAKING PAN WRONG SIZE
customer_reviews.text: I've yet to use the oven. It comes with a wire baking rack and a solid baking pan. UNFORTUNATELY, the baking pan is too small to slide into the oven like the rack does. So, to use the pan, you have to sit it on top of the wire rack. This is not how it is supposed to be. It takes up too much room that way to rotisserie a chicken. Going to see if I can "figure out a way" to use the oven without having to return everything. SO SAD -- I was very excited to try this oven out....*sigh*
customer_reviews.author: Gail Summers

product_meta.title: hOmeLabs Digital Countertop Convection Oven - 1500 Watts, Stainless Steel Exterior with Baking Pan Broil Rack Rotisserie Fork and Removable Crumb Tray - 6-Slice LCD Display Compact Toaster Oven
feature_bullets: CONVECTION HEATING - Uses convection heating technology to circulate warm air throughout the appliance for quick and evenly baking or cooking. Also brings better flavors in your food as the dish inside the oven is cooked at the same rate.

LARGE CAPACITY - This toaster oven can comfortably fit a 12 inch pizza, 6 slice of bread toast at once, or a small rotisserie chicken so you won't need large appliances in the kitchen counter to prepare larger meals.

PREMIUM FEATURES - Features a digital LCD display with easy to use controls that allows you to set temperature up to 450°F and choose from 10 different cooking functions that includes toasting, baking and broiling.
FLEXIBLE RACK POSITIONS - Allows for 3 rack positions that give you total control over how you place your pans when you're baking bread, muffin, 12" pizza or roasting chicken.
USEFUL ACCESSORIES - Stylish stainless steel toaster with a brushed and matte finish that is easy to clean and comes with a broiler rack, bakeware pan, rotisserie fork and a removeable crumb tray.
